channel.title: Tech titbits
channel.description: Random bits and bytes that make up tech titbits that I find interesting.

item.title: Live Templates in Android Studio
item.description: Live templates allow you to quickly add text to the current file. They are context aware so that only relevant templates for the current cursor location are shown. You can insert the template into your file by writing the templates name, or by pressing âŒ˜+j to bring up the live...
